plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutomaticCheckEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='ConfigDataInstall']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='CriticalUpdateInstall']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutoUpdateRestartRequired']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.commerce.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='ControllerPowerState']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.Bluetooth.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0

Ensure /plist/dict/key[.='menuExtras']/following-sibling::*[1]/string[.='/System/Library/CoreServices/Menu Extras/Bluetooth.menu']/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.systemuiserver.plist operation equals datatype string and value /System/Librar
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='idleTime']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.screensaver.plist operation equals datatype int and value 600
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='idleTime']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.screensaver.plist operation equals datatype int and value 1200
Ensure /plist/dict/key[contains(text(), 'corner')]/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.dock.plist operation not equal datatype int and value 6

Ensure /plist/dict/key/following-sibling::*[1]/key[text()='Enabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.nat.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Disabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.screensharing.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Disabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.ODSAgent.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Disabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.AppleFileServer.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Disabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.smbd.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='globalstate']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation greater than or equal datatype int and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='globalstate']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation less than or equal datatype int and value 2
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='stealthenabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation equals datatype int and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='DeviceEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.driver.AppleIRController.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='DeviceEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.driver.AppleIRController operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='UIDFilter']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.driver.AppleIRController operation not equal datatype string and value none
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='SecureKeyboardEntry']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Terminal.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Label']/following-sibling::*[1] in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.auditd.plist operation equals datatype string and value com.apple.auditd
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='loggingenabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation equals datatype int and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='autoLoginUser'] in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow operation equals datatype string and value
Ensure password is required when waking from sleep
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='LoginwindowText']/following-sibling::*[1] in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation pattern match datatype string and value ^.+$
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='LoginwindowText']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation pattern match datatype string and value .*
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='SHOWFULLNAME']/following-sibling::*[1] in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='RetriesUntilHint']/following-sibling::*[1] in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='GuestEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='guestAccess']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.AppleFileServer.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AllowGuestAccess']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.smb.server.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AppleShowAllExtensions']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/.GlobalPreferences.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true

systemsetup_test.comment: Ensure macos:systemsetup_usingnetworktime with operation equals and datatype boolean

Ensure macos:systemsetup_remoteappleevents with operation equals and datatype boolean

file_test.comment: Ensure no file named /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.nat exists and unknown test

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named ~/Library/Mobile/Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Documents exists and does not match pattern ^.*\stotal\s.*$
Ensure at least one file named ~/Library/Mobile/Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Desktop exists and does not match pattern ^.*\stotal\s.*$

file_test.comment: Ensure no file named /etc/exports exists and unknown test
Ensure no file named /Users/Guest exists and unknown test

systemprofiler_test.comment: Ensure SPBluetoothDataType in /plist/array[1]/dict[1]/key[.='_items']/following-sibling::*[1]/dict/key[.='services_title']/following-sibling::*[1]/dict/key/following-sibling::*[1]/key[.='service_state']/following-sibling::*[1] operation equals datatype st

gatekeeper_test.comment: Ensure macos:gatekeeper_enabled with operation equals and datatype boolean is set

file_test.comment: Ensure all {else} no file(s) named ^*$ in /etc/security/audit_control exists and is owned by user 0 and does not have permissions -wx-wxrwx
Ensure any file(s) named ^.*$ in /Users/ exists and has permissions rwx------ and does not have permissions ---rw-rw-
Ensure any file(s) named ^.*\.app$ in /Applications exists and does not have permissions -------w-
Ensure any file(s) named !(Public/Drop Box) in /System exists and does not have permissions -------w-

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure separate timestamp for each user/tty combo

keychain_test.comment: Ensure /Library/Keychains/System.keychain operation equals datatype int and value 21600
Ensure /Library/Keychains/System.keychain operation equals datatype boolean and value true

authorizationdb_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='shared']/following-sibling::*[1] in system.preferences operation equals datatype boolean and value false
Ensure /plist/dict/array/child::*[1] in system.login.screensaver operation equals datatype string and value use-login-window-ui
